allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial FlowNote implementation

A notepad with built-in calculations, variables, and user-defined functions.

Features:
- Freeform text with inline calculation results
- Variables with dot notation \(hotel.perNight = 180\)
- User-defined functions \(tip\(amount, pct\) = amount * pct / 100\)
- Built-in functions: sum, avg, min, max \(work on objects\)
- mathjs integration for scientific functions
- localStorage persistence
- Docker deployment support

Tech stack: React, TypeScript, Vite, CodeMirror 6, mathjs

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add tabs, dark mode, global variables, syntax highlighting, and fixed layout

Features added:
- Multiple tabs/documents with isolated scopes
- Dark mode toggle with system preference detection
- Global variables \(constants\) shared across all tabs
- Syntax highlighting for FlowNote syntax \(light/dark\)
- Fixed header/footer with scrollable editor content

New components:
- TabBar: Tab management with add/close/rename
- GlobalVariablesPanel: Modal for managing global constants
- useTheme hook: Theme state management

New editor extensions:
- flownote-language.ts: StreamLanguage tokenizer
- flownote-theme.ts: Light/dark syntax highlighting styles

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
